summary: It is an action-adventure laced superhero vigilante film that transcends both folklore and present day. It is based on the legend of a man who took upon himself to protect the common man against oppression and injustice.
cast: Shreyas Talpade|Amruta Khanvilkar|Jitendra Joshi|Ila Bhatey|Pushkar Lonarkar|Nandu Mahadav|Nagraj Manjule|Girija Oak|Stunt Silva
title: Baji
